«Minesweeper» - a logic game, which develops attention and logic. Its main goal - to find and mark mines with flags. You have to be very careful, as soon as you open the cage, under which is hidden bomb, the game is over. Minesweeper is wrong only once.

Menu Settings :

1) Number of players. «One player» - single player game mode. «Two players» - function allows two players to play with the two devices, on which installed the game through Bluetooth connectivity.

2) Level of difficulty: «Easy», «Medium», «Hard». It affects the number of mines, installed in the field.

3) Cell size influences the cell\'s size of the playing field, as well as the number of area cells.

4) Language - Change the application language. Supported languages: English and Russian.

Game Mode «Single Player»

Opens the playing field. Under certain cells hidden «mines». The main task - calculate them and not «blown». Number not found mines displayed in the upper left corner.

To start the game you have to click at any place on the field (the main task here - not to run directly on the mine). Open some part of the field where the numbers appear. All these numbers are used to facilitate the search for booby.

The number in the cell indicates the number of mines located around the cell. So the number «1» shows us that the cells located around it, is one mine. If a single cell is unopened, then underneath it and hidden. To mark a cell as a bomb activate selection mode mine by clicking on the icon , while it will change to icon . In this mode, we note the mines. And click on the cell, which we assume is mine. In this cell box will appear, and the counter mines, who need to find, will decrease.

To cancel the selection, once again in the mode of allocation of mines, click on the same cell. The flag will disappear.

Calculating all the possible location of mines, you gradually open the card. Attentively look and find explosive surprises: as soon get to the busy mine cage, game over.

If you are uncomfortable constantly switch from isolation min mark empty mode cell, you can long press on the cage of the field at once to make a move in the opposite mode.

Your task - to mark all mines and to open the empty cells.

Game Mode «Two players»

1) On two devices, which you installed the game, turn on «Two Player» game mode.

2) If you have not turned on Bluetooth, you will be prompted to turn it on. You need to respond positively to this request.

3) Then, you need to establish a connection between your devices. To do this on one of the devices, click on the icon You will be shown a dialog:

4) Here you need to click on the item «Connect device».

5) Next, open the device selection window, the connection to which you want to install.

If the desired device does not notice you. Then the second device must open visibility. To do this, repeat the steps for him the 1st to the 3rd, and then click «Open visibility». Сlick on the «Device Scanning» on the first device. There will be newly available device. Clicking on the name of device, connection with it is installed.

6) When connected to a device dialog appears «Choose who you want to play»

You need to select a player. The second device will automatically become opposing player.

7) The miner mode. You are placed mines on the field. After the laying of mines. Send obtained Sapper field (another device). To do this, click on the button .

At the same time on the second device generated miner box appears. Next to the sapper the game follows the rules of the game in the usual sapper. If sapper disarm all mines, the miner lose, otherwise - will win. The result of the game will be sent sappers miners.
